values: Christ Has Purchased Global Praise: The Blood, the Beast, and the Boast of RaceChrist Has Purchased Global Praise: The Blood, the Beast, and the Boast of Race

Jesus has already paid the price to ransom a global people who live to praise him. And he wants to use you to spread the astoundingly good news. John Piper preached this message at Bethlehem College & Seminary in Minneapolis.Jesus has already paid the price to ransom a global people who live to praise him. And he wants to use you to spread the astoundingly good news. John Piper preached this message at Bethlehem College & Seminary in Minneapolis.
